title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 102.4 - Hitchhiking; loitering
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 102.4 - Hitchhiking; loitering

State Regulations

The solicitation of a ride, commonly known as hitchhiking, or stopping any vehicle for the purpose of picking up or discharging a
hitchhiker, on any portion of the Thruway system, including toll plazas, is
prohibited. Loitering in or about the toll plazas or any other portion of the

Thruway system, for the purpose of hitchhiking or for any other purpose, is
prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
102.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
